text: build list of lists using comprehension lists two at a time
I am using the following code to build a list of lists:

code:
res = []
for i in I:
   res.append(x)
   res.append(y[i])

text: so my final list is [x, y[0], x, y[1],...] where x and y[i] are also lists.
Is there a way building this list using list comprehensions, instead of for loop?
